mapper.select:
SELECT AUDIT_UUID AS auditUuid, ENTITY_TYPE_UUID AS entityTypeUuid, ENTITY_COLUMN_UUID AS entityColumnUuid, PROGRAM_UUID AS programUuid, PROGRAM_NAME AS programName, FUNCTION_UUID AS functionUuid, PRIMARY_KEY_UUID AS primaryKeyUuid, PREVIOUS_VALUE AS previousValue, NEW_VALUE AS newValue, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes,
AS insertUuid,
INSERT_DATE AS insertDate,
AS updateUuid,
UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM AD_AUDIT WHERE 1=1
